note: Records thesis statements for each essay by prompt_id and student name

essays.thesis_statement: I used to be obsessed with a cartoon cat show, and it's embarrassing now because everyone knows about it, I was too serious about it, and I still can't let go of the stuffed animal, which shows I'm supposed to be more mature now.
I used to sleep with a stuffed bear named Buzzy every night, and it's embarrassing now because I'm thirteen and it's not cool, my brother teases me about it, and I was way too attached to it.

I used to be obsessed with a sparkly unicorn show and wanted to be a unicorn, and it's embarrassing now because it was childish, I had a whole collection and talked to the toys, and there are embarrassing videos of me doing unicorn dances.

I was obsessed with an educational kids' show about numbers and treated it like serious mathematics, and it's embarrassing now because I realize how childish it was, I had a whole system with charts and organized my toys, and my brother still makes fun of me about it.

I was literally obsessed with being a princess and made everyone call me 'Princess Chloe,' and it's embarrassing now because I realize how ridiculous it was, I was so dramatic about it with tantrums and speeches, and my sister still brings it up.

I had a stuffed dog named Buster that I treated like he was real, and it's embarrassing now because I realize how much I depended on him, I would pretend he was real with water bowls and walks, and I still have him hidden in my closet.

I was completely obsessed with a kids' detective cat show and treated it like it was sophisticated, and it's embarrassing now because I realize how ridiculous that was, I would argue competitively about it, and I still remember all the episodes.

I was totally obsessed with a superhero show and pretended to be Captain Awesome, and it's embarrassing now because I realize how cringe that was, I would do it in public and correct people who didn't use my superhero name, and my mom still has the cape.

I was very interested in a cartoon show when I was younger, and it is embarrassing now because I realize the show was designed for much younger children, I was very serious about it and would get upset if someone did not like it, and my parents have videos of me pretending to be one of the characters.

I was obsessed with a mainstream kids' show and thought it was cool, and it's embarrassing now because I realize how fake it was, I would defend it and thought I was being unique but I was just following the crowd, and my brother still makes fun of me about it.

I was totally obsessed with being a princess and had princess everything, and it's embarrassing now because I realize how silly that was, I would make everyone call me 'Princess Sofia' and do princess dances, and my mom has videos of me doing it.

I was quite interested in an educational program designed for much younger children, and it is embarrassing now because I realize the program was age-appropriate for five or six year olds, I was very serious about it and would correct people, and my parents have recordings of me explaining concepts to my stuffed animals.

I was completely obsessed with an educational science show designed for little kids, and it's embarrassing now because I realize the scientific concepts were very basic, I was so serious about it and would correct people, and my parents have videos of me explaining concepts to my stuffed animals.

I was completely obsessed with a fantasy cartoon show and thought it was the most epic story ever, and it's embarrassing now because I realize the story was very simple, I was so serious about it and would defend it, and my parents have videos of me doing 'quests' around the house.

I was completely obsessed with Disney movies and thought they were the best thing ever, and it is embarrassing now because I realize the movies were designed for little kids, I was so serious about it and would correct people, and my parents have videos of me doing Disney character impressions.
